document_data.mainbody:
Yulia Strauss was a human armorer for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
Yulia was an over-confident virtuoso craftswoman and armorer with a serious demeanor and strong work ethic. Even though she was confident to a fault, her skills and and demeanor ensured her continuous employment. Yulia made a living by selling her armorers skills to those who could afford them, including adventurers of Neverwinter in the late 15 century DR.
